changelog: [*]Added circle and rectangle shape tools[*]Automatic palette updates on color change can be toggled using the button.[*]Color replacement can be toggled when importing a palette[*]Automatic tile updates when overwriting a tile in the tileset can be toggled[*]Crash messages when closing JPixel on Windows 10 shouldn't occur anymore
[*]Fixed a bug occurring when merging down layers[*]Clicking outside the canvas while using the Selection tool will reset the current selection

[*]New frames are added after the current frame[*]New layers are added over the current layer[*]Selections can be dragged outside the canvas[*]Added ctrl/alt shortcuts to add/subtract selections[*]Added single frame .png export[*]UI changes
[*]Fixed a bug occurring when increasing the width of the tileset panel[*]Added help tooltips for the palette and tileset panels

[*].gif can now be opened[*]Added mirror canvas functions[*]Added rotate layer/selection functions[*]Added contiguous wand tool[*]Files can now have a custom background[*]Improved saturation filter[*]Improved importing/exporting[*]UI changes and improvements

[*]Implemented multiple tile functionalities to the tiles panel[*]Added selection size helper[*]Update checks can be disabled in Settings[*]Minor UI changes and fixes[*]Improved thumbnails performance

[*]Implemented Outline filter[*]Copying a selection will now discard transparent pixels[*].jpx extension is added automatically to the filename if missing when saving a new file[*]Undo/Redo won't affect the filename anymore[*]The background can be changed to any color in Settings
[*]Implemented variable speed animations[*]Implemented Import/Export PNG palettes[*]Implemented updates notifications[*]Bug fixing and improvements
